attributes.action: End the practice of Filibustering in the House of Commons
attributes.additional_details: Alan Turing Bill, debated in House of Commons, 21st October.
attributes.background: In light of the disgraceful and undemocratic action of MP and so called Justice Secretary Sam Gyimah the time has surely come to end the outdated practice of Filibustering-talking beyond the time allowed to stop a motion being voted on. If arguments in the time allowed cannot, convince so be it.
